plot: High school student Chio Miyamo has adventures commuting to school every day. Chio runs in to problems both big and small, such as construction, a biker gang, a sudden urge to use the bathroom, and more. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Danger in my Tsūgakuro" (Danger in My School Commute) by Naomi Ōzora, Chiaki Omigawa, & Kaede Hondo
ending_theme: "Nana Iroad" (Rainbow Coloroad) by Naomi Ōzora & Chiaki Omigawa
